summary: ENGINE HAS BEEN OVERHEATING FOR A YEAR NOW.  TOOK VEHICLE TO PONTIAC.  THEY TESTED IT AND REPLACED THE WATER PUMP.  STILL OVERHEATING SO THEY REPLACED THE THERMOSTAT AND RADIATOR CAP.  STILL OVERHEATING.  PONTIAC STATED IT NEEDED A NEW HEAD GASKET AND WANTED $3500.00 TO REPLACE IT.  THEY FURTHER STATED THEY WERE NOT SURE THIS WAS THE PROBLEM EITHER.  I HAVE ALREADY PAID $500.00 FOR THE PREVIOUS SERVICE.  I HAVE READ THERE ARE MANY OTHERS WITH THIS SAME PROBLEM WITH GM 3.4 LITER ENGINES.    *NLM
